channel.title: Role type needs to be easier and quicker to view
channel.description:
When you get players who are new or don't know what every class does it negates the use of those which can identify/narrow down the types.
I was thinking different font colors or background colors in the role screen. Putting them in lanes would also work but would probably look ugly for those factions with few roles.
